title: 使用类实现任务调度
student_answer:
<script>
      function PriorityQueue() {
    
    var items = []
   
    function queueEle(ele, priority) {
        this.ele = ele
        this.priority = priority
    }
   
    this.enqueue = function (ele, priority) {
        let element = new queueEle(ele, priority)
      
        if (this.isEmpty()) {
            items.push(element)
        }
        else {
            var qeueued = false;
            for (let i = 0; i < this.size(); i++) {
                if (element.priority < items[i].priority) {
                    items.splice(i, 0, element)
                    qeueued = true
                    break;
                }
            }
            
            if (!qeueued) items.push(element)
        }
    }

   
    this.dequeue = function () {
        return items.shift()
    }

   
    this.front = function () {
        return items[0]
    }

  
    this.isEmpty = function () {
        return items.length == 0
    }


    this.clear = function () {
        items = []
    }

 
    this.size = function () {
        return items.length
    }


    this.show = function () {
        return items
    }
}

var priorityQueue = new PriorityQueue();
priorityQueue.enqueue('优先级2-1', 2);
priorityQueue.enqueue('优先级1-1', 1);
priorityQueue.enqueue('优先级1-2', 1);
priorityQueue.enqueue('优先级3-1', 3);

console.log(priorityQueue.show()); // 按优先级顺序输出
 </script>
